articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Machine Plant Managed by Ho Chol Yong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Machine Plant Managed by Ho Chol Yong
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the machine plant managed by Ho Chol Yong. 
					 Going round the processing and assembling shops, he learned in detail about the production and modernization of the plant.
					
					 At the processing shop he was greatly satisfied to see CNC-based lathes producing varieties of machine parts. 
					
					 After going round the monument to the revolutionary activities of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he said the plant is of weighty importance in the nation's machine-building industry and the WPK attaches great importance to it. 
					
					 At the assembling shop he learned in detail about the mechanism and technical specifications of the finished machines. 
					
					 He, at the same time, learned about the performance of the machines built at the plant. 
					
					 The machines are high in their performance and look nice, he said, appreciating feats performed by officials, workers, scientists and technicians of the plant in building modern machines of Korean style. 
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the plant. 
					
					 He underscored the need to produce more updated machines which are suited to the actual conditions of the country, which prove highly effective in practice and are favored by the users. 
					
					 He called on the relevant units to wage a dynamic drive to provide updated machine parts of Korean style in good time.
					
					 He went round the hostel of workers of the plant. 
					
					 He dropped in at the rooms visited by Kim Il Sung in the past. He said that the rooms are kept clean and neat and they are liked by hostellers. 
					
					 Going round the dining room and non-staple foodstuff store, he learnt about the supply service to the hostellers. 
					
					 Then he visited the newly built kindergarten of the plant. 
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the fact that the plant has successfully built a playground and play-yard so that children may fully enjoy playing. Then he moved to the room devoted to the history of the plant. 
					
					 He heard with deep attention stories about the warm loving care shown by Kim Il Sung for the kindergarten before going round various rooms. 
					
					 He also looked at words written by children with brushes. 
					
					  After watching a performance given by kindergarteners at an amusement room, he took them to his arms and had a photo taken with them.
					
					 He repeatedly asked its teachers to feed the children well and bring them up in such a way that they may always feel happy.
					
					 The last leg of his guidance was the Kangsong Health Complex.
					
					 Going round the amusement room, gymnasium, swimming and wading pools and dining rooms of the health complex, he was told that workers' life was also envied by people in urban areas. He said that he was also pleased to hear that they fully enjoy a highly civilized life in the society for workers.
					
					 He provided the plant with vehicles needed by it, saying that he would personally take charge of supplies, if it proves successful in production. 
					
					 He had a photo session with workers of the plant.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Song, Hong Yong Chil, Son Chol Ju and Yun Tong Hyon.

articles.title: DPRK Proposes Official Talks with U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK Proposes Official Talks with U.S.
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK issued the following crucial statement on Sunday:
					 The present U.S. administration is now asserting that the development of the situation depends on the DPRK, urging the DPRK to show the will for denuclearization first and stop "provocation" and "threats" in order to defuse tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is misleading the public opinion and deceiving the world, trying to give impression that the DPRK is to blame for the tensions that have so far mounted on the peninsula.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities that have been accustomed to sycophancy and submission and the forces following the U.S. are dancing to its tune.
					
					 In this regard the NDC of the DPRK clarifies the following crucial stand upon authorization:
					
					1. We state to the world once again that it is none other than the U.S. which has steadily strained the situation on the Korean Peninsula century after century and decade after decade.
					
					 It was the U.S. which provoked the war of aggression on the Korean Peninsula in the 1950s and it is again the U.S. which has systematically scrapped the Korean Armistice Agreement for the past six decades after the end of the war.
					
					 Entering into the first decade of the new century, the U.S. has persistently tried to ignite a war against the DPRK again.
					
					 From December last year, the U.S. has pulled up the DPRK, describing its legitimate and just satellite launch as a long-range missile launch and its military measures for self-defence to cope with the U.S. open aggression moves as sort of "provocation". This fully discloses its nature as the worst provoker and aggressor.
					
					 The gangster-like resolution on "sanctions" which the U.S. masterminded and all the hostile acts that have been intensified following the adoption of the resolution were an intolerable and serious provocation against the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 There is a limit to patience. The U.S. should no longer cling to acts of misleading the public opinion and deceiving the world while vociferating about the non-existent "provocation" and "threats".
					
					 It will be a foolish calculation for the U.S. to think that its arbitrary practices reminding one of a thief crying "stop the thief" will work on the bright world today. 
					
					2. We state to the world once again that the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is an invariable will and resolve of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula was behests of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and a policy task which the party, state, army and people of the DPRK have to carry out without fail.
					
					 The denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula does not only mean "dismantling the nuclear weapons of the north". It is the complete one that calls for denuclearizing the whole peninsula including south Korea and aims at totally ending the U.S. nuclear threats to the DPRK.
					
					 As for the possession of nuclear weapons by the DPRK, it is the strategic option taken by the DPRK for self-defence to denuclearize the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The legitimate status of the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state will go on and on without vacillation whether others recognize it or not until the whole Korean Peninsula is denuclearized and the nuclear threats from outside are put to a final end.
					
					 Therefore, the U.S. should stop nuclear threats and blackmail and all forms of provocations including "sanctions" against the DPRK, before urging it to show first its sincerity regarding the will for denuclearization to open the phase for dialogue.
					
					3. We propose senior-level talks between the authorities of the DPRK and the U.S. to defuse tensions on the Korean Peninsula and ensure peace and security in the region.
					
					 If the U.S. has true intent on defusing tensions on the Korean Peninsula and ensuring peace and security in the U.S. mainland and the region, it should not raise precondition for dialogue and contact.
					
					 The talks can have broad and in-depth discussions on defusing military tensions, replacing the armistice system with peace mechanism and other issues of mutual concern including the building of a "world without nuclear weapons" proposed by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. can set the venue and date of the talks to its convenience.
					
					 Consistent is the stand of the DPRK to defuse tensions on the Korean Peninsula and ensure peace and security of the region.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wants to realize a "world without nuclear weapons" and bring detente, it should positively respond to the DPRK's bold decision and good intention, not missing the opportunity.
					
					 All the future developments entirely depend on the responsible option of the U.S., which has strained the situation on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: KPA Personnel Tour Front Areas
articles.content:
KPA Personnel Tour Front Areas
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) continue tours to revolutionary sites in front areas. The march is to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 On June 10 the marchers arrived at Height 351 associated with the undying feats of the heroic soldiers during the war.
					
					 They looked round observation post, battle field and other places, being briefed on the fact that soldiers devoted their youth and life to the party, leader, country and the people.
					
					 They held a meeting for hearing reminiscences in Wolbisan-ri and crossed Onjong Pass. Upon arrival in Naegumgang-ri, Kumgang County on June 12, they held a meeting around bonfire.
					
					 On June 14, the marchers arrived at the Sungap Revolutionary Site reflective of the leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung, who opened a bright prospect for the final victory in the war in the autumn of Juche 41 (1952).
					
					 Listening to an explanation briefed that the President came to the place where the front command was located despite the shower of shells and powder smoke and advanced superb operational and tactical policy, the marchers looked round several places of the site.
					
					 On June 15, they visited the revolutionary site on Mt. Jihye.
					
					 The marchers climbed Height 1211 on June 16. Visiting Hero Ri Su Bok Company they went round the monument to the on-the-spot guidance of Kim Jong Il and other places before holding a meeting at the camping site.
					
					 They continue their march, deeply acquiring the undying revolutionary exploits of the Generalissimos.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Call for Creating Second, Third "Masikryong Speed"
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Call for Creating Second, Third "Masikryong Speed"
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in provinces and city on June 15 and 16 to vow to devotedly carry out the important tasks given by the dear respected Kim Jong Un in his historic appeal and respond to the letter sent to the people across the country by those reclaiming the Sepho tableland. They are North Phyongan, Jagang, North Hwanghae, South and North Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces and Nampho City.
					 Present there were leading officials of the local party and power organs and working people's organizations, officials and other people of factories, enterprises and co-op farms and teaching staff and students of universities and colleges.
					
					 Read out at the rallies was the appeal sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 It was followed by the recitation of the letter sent by those reclaiming the Sepho tableland.
					
					 Speakers noted all officials and other people are heartily responding to the letter with an ardor to thoroughly implement the important tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his historic appeal.
					
					 The appeal reflects his great trust in the service personnel and people of the DPRK who carry out whatever the WPK is determined to do, they said.
					
					 They renewed their pledge to make patriotic devotion for implementing the policy of the party, cherishing deep the conviction that they can surely win victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They underscored the need to make a brisk campaign to create the second and third "Masikryong Speed" and bring about fresh miracles and innovations in all fields and units.

articles.title: S. Korean Papers Blame "Government" for Failed South-North Talks
articles.content:
S. Korean Papers Blame "Government" for Failed South-North Talks
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- South Korean newspapers carried articles on June 12 denouncing the puppet authorities for torpedoing the talks between the authorities of the north and the south.
					 Hangyore in an article "South-north talks prove abortive due to unreasonable demand raised by the government" said it is unprecedented that the south-north authorities talks failed even though an agreement was reached over venue and itinerary.
					
					 The responsibility rests with the "government" which raised unreasonable demand to the north, the article said, adding:
					
					 The "government's" attitude and stubborn demand were problematic and inappropriate from every aspect.
					
					 The paper said that south-north talks will not be possible if past mode is dismissed wrong.
					
					 Kyunghyang Daily News expressed disappointment over the breakdown of the talks.
					
					 The paper stressed that the responsibility for the breakdown of the talks rests with the present "government".
					
					 It urged the "government" to reflect on whether it approached the talks with sincerity.
					
					 If the Park Geun Hye "government" fails to open the talks, it will face criticism that it made bigger mess of the south-north ties than the Lee Myung Bak's "government".
					
					 Hankuk Ilbo expressed regret over the failure of the talks.
					
					 It called for rekindling the fire of dialogue.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Castigated for Torpedoing Inter-Korean Talks
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Castigated for Torpedoing Inter-Korean Talks
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- 29 organizations of south Korea, including the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, Buddhist Peace Solidarity, Federation of Peasants Associations, Confederation of Trade Unions, Federation of the Poor, Women's Solidarity and the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century held an emergency press conference on June 12 as regards the talks between the authorities of the north and the south that proved abortive.
					 At the conference the organizations accused the south side of raising the issue of the "level" of the delegate to the talks at the working contact and designating the delegation head of the north side. The organizations also denounced a high-ranking Chongwadae official for raising controversial points while claiming that "it is hard to build confidence if level is not suitable".
					
					 But the "government" once admitted that it was an excessive demand and many experts estimate that the director of the United Front Department of the north side is not the level of the minister of Unification of the south side, they said.
					
					 The "government" pushed for the excessive demand for the north side while distorting the fact, an indication of its intention to tame the other party, they noted.
					
					 It is hard to understand that the authorities proposed holding the ministerial-level talks from the outset and degraded the level of the chief delegate to vice-minister later, they said.
					
					 They urged the "government" to approach the talks between the authorities of the south and the north with the will to implement the joint declarations by prioritizing the common interests of the nation, away from the stand of seeking political goal or escalating confrontation.
					
					 They also demanded the authorities lend an ear to loud voices aspiring after improved inter-Korean relations, peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Members of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Inhabitants' Measure Committee against the Expansion of Mugon-ri Drill Ground and other civic and pubic organizations of south Korea on Thursday held a meeting for honoring the memory of Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son who were ruthlessly killed by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces.
					 The meeting took place on the road of Hyochon-ri, Kwangjok-myon, Yangju City, Kyonggi Province where the two schoolgirls were killed by a U.S. armored car.
					
					 At the meeting speakers said that the GIs hell-bent on the north-targeted war maneuvers ran an armored car over the passing-by schoolgirls, killing them. But the murderers have not yet been punished due to the unequal south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA), they lamented.
					
					 The GIs are the cause of all misfortune and sufferings, they said, urging the U.S. forces to withdraw from south Korea at an early date.
					
					 The shackling SOFA should be abolished at once, they stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Evading Blame for Making Inter-Korean Talks Abortive
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Evading Blame for Making Inter-Korean Talks Abortive
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is insisting on a groundless logic to justify its act of scuttling the talks between the authorities of the north and the south.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The puppet group is crying out for "normalization" while making mention of "practices of talks between the south and the north". But this is cunning and dishonest sophism.
					
					 The group is saying that it is necessary to have "dialogue suited to level", not a "shackling one", shameless nonsense of those who torpedoed the dialogue.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities are terming the past inter-Korean dialogue "abnormal" one in which they were taken in by the north. This is an unimaginable racket which can be made by those who had no intention to have dialogue and improve relations between the north and the south.
					
					 The "past abnormal practices" the puppet group is talking about is not a problem. What matters is the distorted perspective of the present south Korean authorities on the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It has now become clearer that the "principle" and "trust" spoken out by the puppet authorities are anti-reunification "ones" aimed to totally deny the dynamic inter-Korean relations in the June 15 era of reunification and formulate the north-south ties of confrontation without dialogue as "south-north ties in favor of development".
					
					 The present puppet group's unhesitating act of hobbling the efforts for the talks which were arranged with much effort in the first days of its office makes one predict that it will follow in the footsteps of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which was thrown into the dumping ground of history, failing to have any inter-Korean dialogue to speak of.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Slammed for Escalating Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Slammed for Escalating Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Kwan Jin, puppet minister of Defense of south Korea, at a recent meeting with the U.S. Secretary of Defense and the Japanese minister of Defense in Singapore, published a joint statement promising "cooperation to deter the north's provocations".
					 Jong Sung Jo, chairman of the puppet joint chiefs of staff, touring a foreign country aboard a military plane, made belligerent remarks, blustering "resolute counteraction to the north's provocation".
					
					 The puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs has joined the military warmongers in their moves for confrontation with a cry for "high-level strategic dialogue".
					
					 Minju Joson Sunday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The puppet group is working hard to justify and escalate its reckless moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen with sophism of coping with the "north's provocation" but such rhetoric will not work on anyone.
					
					 There may be individuals dancing to the tune of the puppet group's moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen but the DPRK will not be subject to "psychological pressure".
					
					 To be frank, the moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen can never be a thing to be proud of. They will only bring into bolder relief the despicable treacherous nature of the puppet forces escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula and, accordingly, spark off bitter international denunciation.
					
					 The group should abandon the bad habit of driving a wedge between the DPRK and other countries and stop the moves of escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Anti-DPRK War Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Anti-DPRK War Exercises
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Command for Defense of Islands in Northwest Sea waged north-targeted war exercises under the pretext of reinforcing and defending islands in the West Sea of Korea on June 14, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The puppet warmongers activated more than 5,000-strong troops, artillery pieces with various missions and copters, transport planes, warships and other attack weapons belonging to the flight operational command of the ground force and the naval operational command.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Celebrated by Korean Students in Japan
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Celebrated by Korean Students in Japan
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- An evening gala "Evening longing for reunification" for marking the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration took place at Joson University under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on June 13 under the sponsorship of the university committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan.
					 Put on the stage were chorus "Reunification by Our Nation Itself" other numbers on the theme of national reunification.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan marked the 13th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					 Present at the event were Ju Yong Il and Ko Tae Chun who are chairman and vice-chairman of the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan, heads of art troupes of Korean compatriots and more than 200 Koreans.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the charge d'affaires ad interim and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Tashkent.
					
					 Ju Yong Il in his speech said that the June 15 joint declaration provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il is important guidelines of the struggle for national reunification.
					
					 Signal events took place in the struggle to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve the reunification of the country in the course of implementing the joint declaration which reflected the spirit of "By our nation itself", he noted.
					
					 In the June 15 era of reunification the compatriots keenly realized that to implement the joint declaration is the way of reunifying the country and achieving the prosperity of the Korean nation, he said.
					
					 He called upon overseas Koreans to know well about the vitality of the joint declaration, rise up as one in the efforts to implement it and thus make contribution to the patriotic work for national reunification, small as it may be.
					
					 He stressed that a bright prospect is set in store for national reunification and the nation thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then a performance was given by art troupes of Korean compatriots.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried on Romanian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried on Romanian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The June issue of the Romanian newspaper Romania Muncitoare carried the gist of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party".
					 The work, published on January 3, Juche 81 (1992), says the historical lesson in building socialism is that one should consolidate the driving force of the revolution with faith in socialism and proper guiding idea, preserve the socialist principle and boost comradely unity and cooperation based on independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Seminars, lectures, meetings and round-table talks took place in Romania, Serbia, Switzerland, Malaysia, Nepal, Nigeria and Peru from June 7 to 12.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said that the history of the WPK would be unthinkable apart from Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general secretary of the New Yugoslavia Communist Party of Serbia said that Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist power.
					
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into a party serving the popular masses and smashed the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK by enforcing the great Songun politics and thus firmly defended the Korean revolution and the socialist cause.
					
					 Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, praised the immortal feats of Kim Jong Il who strengthened and developed the WPK into the experienced, seasoned and invincible ranks that have achieved the steel-strong unity and cohesion on the basis of the Juche idea.
					
					 Guillermo Alcazar Ribera, chairman of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, praised Kim Jong Il for making a great contribution on behalf of the era and history after being born as the shining star over Mt. Paektu in the flames of the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, and general director of the M.K.P. Company of Malaysia lauded Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into an invincible party.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to the dear respected Kim Jong Un were adopted at a meeting and a seminar in Switzerland and Nepal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building Introduced in Peru, Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building Introduced in Peru, Ecuador
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations and an institution of Peru and Ecuador posted special write-ups on their websites on June 6 and 7 to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship posted his portrait and an article which said:
					
					 Working at the WPK Central Committee, he clarified the new idea on the leadership position and role of the party in the revolution and construction and turned the party into an invincible one leading to victory the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of socialism, the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The great feats he performed in the course of building and leading the party for nearly five decades will be immortal along with the times.
					
					 The Kim Jong Il Library and the Juche Youth Group in Ecuador posted articles titled "Kim Jong Il's feats for building WPK" and "Turning the WPK into mother party."
					
					 In the preface the website praised him for performing immortal exploits in building the WPK and developing it into the mother party holding aloft the slogan "We serve the people!"
					
					 The WPK holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its eternal general secretary will continue shedding its rays as a guiding force leading to victory the struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification and global independence under the guidance of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of social circles of Russia was inaugurated in Moscow on June 10 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. It was sponsored by the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					 Chairman of the association Victor Petrov was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. It comprises prominent figures of political parties, organizations and institutions.
					
					 It decided to organize meeting, lecture, film show, photo exhibition and other political and cultural events on the occasion of the anniversary.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees were inaugurated in South Africa, Serbia, Kuwait and Guinea from June 8 to 11 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The committees decided to organize meeting, seminar, lecture, film show, photo exhibition and other political and cultural events on the occasion.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Was Outstanding Leader: Kuwaiti Personage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Was Outstanding Leader: Kuwaiti Personage
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was an outstanding leader who defeated the world imperialist allied forces. The chairman of the Kuwaiti preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War said this at the inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee on June 10.
					 The Korean people's great victory in the war is a historic one for progressive mankind aspiring after independence against imperialism, he noted, adding:
					
					 The Korean people are successfully carrying forward the tradition of winning one victory after another as they hold in high esteem the dear respected Kim Jong Un, identical to Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, as their supreme leader.
					
					 We will raise the voices of support and solidarity with the DPRK with the 60th anniversary of victory in war as a momentum.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Guinea
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Guinea
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- We, loving progress and justice and struggling for the future, will join the fraternal Korean people in significantly celebrating the 60th anniversary of their victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said this on June 11.
					
					 Upcoming July 27 is the significant day which marks the 60th anniversary of the heroic Korean people's victory in the Korean War started by the U.S., the chairman noted, and went on:
					
					 After its occupation of south Korea, the U.S. had pushed forward the preparations for provoking a war against the DPRK in a premeditated manner and started sudden invasion of the DPRK at last by instigating the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung the army and people of the DPRK resolutely defeated the aggressors and achieved a great victory on July 27, 1953.
					
					 The chairman evinced his pledge to widely introduce the undying feats Kim Il Sung performed by leading the war to victory and the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He also voiced his resolve to activate solidarity movement supporting the heroic Korean people in their dynamic struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to the last instructions of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Vidrio de Taegwan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Vidrio de Taegwan
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Vidrio de Taegwan.
					Primeramente, hizo conocimiento detallado del funcionamiento de los aparatos opticos que produce la Fabrica.
					
					Dijo que se han mejorado considerablemente el funcionamiento de los aparatos y su seguridad, en comparacion con el ano pasado, y agrego que para surtir efecto los productos en la realidad, hay que elevar su precision.
					
					Se refirio a que la inspeccion sobre el funcionamiento realizado hoy comprueba que pueden alcanzar exitos si trabajan concentrando la fuerza en la investigacion cientifica y la renovacion tecnica.
					
					En el taller de montaje, el Mariscal se cercioro en detalles del estado de produccion y de la calidad de productos.
					
					Destaco que los aparatos opticos son los articulos de punta que exigen la tecnologia sofisticada y agrego que para mejorar la calidad, hay que poner de pleno manifiesto las fuerzas espirituales de los productores, profundizar mas la investigacion cientifica y elevar la capacitacion tecnologica de los obreros.
					
					Enseno que deben concentrar la fuerza en el independiente desarrollo tecnico capaz de superar el nivel mundial, realizar la modernizacion y automatizacion de los procesos de produccion y empenarse por elevar la proporcion de uso de los productos nacionales.
					
					Anadio que deben elevar la exigencia a las unidades que producen en cooperacion los articulos y organizar bien la operacion en cooperacion.
					
					Estuvo en el lugar de trabajo CNC en el taller de montaje donde averiguo el estado de funcionamiento de las instalaciones.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en la gestion y produccion de la fabrica.
					
					 Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que en pleno acato a la idea del PTC de alcanzar el nivel sofisticado, los obreros de la fabrica produciran mas los articulos de vidrio y aparatos  opticos de buena calidad mediante el movimiento masivo por renovacion tecnica y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Song, Hong Yong Chil, y el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Ri Man Gon.

articles.title: CDN declara posicion importante de RPDC para aliviar tension de Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
CDN declara posicion importante de RPDC para aliviar tension de Peninsula Coreana
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 16 la siguiente declaracion importante:
					  En estos dias, la actual administracion estadounidense dice como si toda la evolucion de la situacion dependiera de nuestra opcion insistiendo en que para aliviar la fase tirante creada en la Peninsula Coreana la RPDC debe mostrar primero la voluntad de desnuclearizacion y dejar la "provocacion " y la "amenaza".
					
					  De mal en peor, induce en error la opinion publica y engana al mundo como si la RPDC tuviera la responsabilidad de haber exacerbado la situacion de esta Peninsula.
					
					  A esta campana se suman las actuales autoridades surcoreanas, acostumbradas al servilisimo a las grandes potencias, y otras fuerzas satelites.
					
					  Al respecto, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, por encargo, aclara al interior y exterior del pais la siguiente posicion importante:
					
					  1. Damos a conocer claramente otra vez que Estados Unidos es precisamente el autor que ha venido exacerbando de siglo en siglo y de decada en decada la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  EE.UU. desato la guerra de agresion en esta peninsula en la decada de los 50 del siglo pasado y destruyo sistematicamente el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea durante 60 anos posbelicos.
					
					Al entrar en la decada de los 10 del nuevo siglo, vuelve a maniobrar obstinadamente para desencadenar otra guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					Desde diciembre del ano expirado califico nuestro legitimo y justo lanzamiento de satelite como el disparo de misil de largo alcance, y nuestras medidas militares de autodefensa tomadas frente a sus abiertas maniobras agresivas, como una "provocacion". De esta manera, puso al desnudo su naturaleza de provocador mas cinico y agresor mas bandidesco.
					
					Las resoluciones de "sancion" inventadas a instigacion de EE.UU. y todos sus actos hostiles mas siniestros anti-RPDC constituyen grave provocacion intolerable contra nuestro ejercito y pueblo.
					
					Hay limite en la paciencia, razon por la cual EE.UU. no debe aferrarse al engano a la opinion publica y al mundo hablando tanto de la inexistente "provocacion" y "amenaza" de alguien.
					
					Sera muy absurdo si EE.UU. piensa en que tales atrocidades podrian convencer a las personas en este mundo.
					
					2. Volvemos a aclarar al interior y exterior del pais que nuestro ejercito y pueblo tienen la invariable voluntad y decision de desnuclearizar la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana es el legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la tarea politica a ser cumplida sin falta por nuestro partido, Estado, militares y civiles. 
					
					La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana  no es la desnuclearizacion para la "renuncia nuclear del Norte" sino la de toda la extension de la Peninsula Coreana inclusive el Sur de Corea y tiene la meta de acabar completamente con la amenaza nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					En cuanto a la posesion de armas nucleare de la RPDC, esto es la opcion autodefensiva y estrategica para realizar la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					La digna posicion de la RPDC como pais con armas nucleares se mantendra con firmeza hasta cuando se alcance la desnuclearizacion de toda la Peninsula Coreana y desaparezca por completo la amenaza nuclear de las fuerzas extranjeras, independientemente de que alguien lo reconozca o no. 
					
					Pues, para abrir la coyuntura de dialogo, EE.UU. debe dejar, primero, la amenaza y chantaje nucleares anti-RPDC y las provocaciones de toda indole incluso la "sancion", antes de demandarnos demostrar la sinceridad en la voluntad de desnuclearizacion. 
					
					3. Proponemos sostener las conversaciones de alto nivel entre las autoridades de EE.UU. y RPDC para eliminar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y preservar la paz y la seguridad de la region. 
					
					Si EE.UU. tiene de veras algun interes en aliviar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y garantizar la paz y la seguridad de su territorio principal y el resto de la region, no debe hablar del dialogo y contacto anteponiendo la premisa. 
					
					En esta cita podrian discutirse con sinceridad y profundamente varios temas deseados por ambas partes, entre otros, el alivio de la tension militar, la sustitucion del sistema de armisticio por el de paz y la "construccion del mundo libre de armas nucleares" presentada por EE.UU. 
					
					El lugar y el tiempo de dialogo,  podra fijarlos EE.UU. segun su conveniencia.
					
					Es invariable nuestra posicion de aliviar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y preservar la paz y seguridad de la region.
					
					Si EE.UU. desea de veras el "mundo libre de armas nucleares" y el alivio de la tension, debe responder a nuestra decision magnanima y buena bondad sin perder esta oportunidad. 
					
					La evolucion de la situacion depiende de la opcion responsable de EE.UU. que hasta ahora ha venido agravando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
